
== Here is an overview of rBruno.com's Data Model ==

First lets start with domains. This is in reference to the book
_Domain Driven Design_ (not internet domains).

## The Page domain ##

The Page domain enables each page to load and also helps special
pages such as the homepage.

### Entities ###

page (
    *URI 
)
    
### Value Objects ###

slate (
    Name
)

page (
    Title,
    Content,
    *Summary,
    *Priority,
)
    
### Relationships ###

page --1-> page
page --n-> slates
